Game 12, a computer keyboard instrument in the format of a game, enables users of any skill level to play competently within minutes to hours. Details withheld until Beta release.

The individual pieces in this chess set are designed in response to how each piece moves on the board. Each piece (other than the knight) has resting pivots indicating the directions they roll on the board.
I got bored during Covid so I made a game where you throw chains at hooks. After becoming popular among friends, the rules and components became highly refined.
Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare Game Jam, Sweet Dreams is a computer game where the player has to simultaneously manage the nightmares of 3 siblings.
